title: With the new client coming would it be possible to get an in-client wiki?
body:
When the new client comes out would it be possible to have some sort of community wiki added in? It's frustrating to look for info online as more often than not the posts are not up to date or don't have the info I'm looking for. With a wiki available in client it would be fast and safe for players to share info while giving a resource for new players to reference should they wish to learn about something but not know where to look for it.

I guess in a way I'd like to have a resource in-client to reference at my fingertips rather than googling it and taking away my time from the game itself.

replies.body: And one bump for views XP
